| Rank | AI-Powered Service | Marketing Channel | Reasoning | Specific Messaging for Target User Persona | Relevant Criteria |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 7 | AI-powered user testing and analytics | Podcast Sponsorships | Reaches an engaged audience of UX designers and other professionals interested in improving user experiences. | "Enhance user experience with AI-powered user testing and analytics." | Engaging, targeted |
|  |  | Twitter Ads | Targets UX designers and product managers with sponsored tweets showcasing the benefits of AI-powered user testing and analytics. |  | Social media, targeted |
| 8 | AI-assisted UX/UI design | Dribbble | Shares innovative AI-generated designs on a platform popular among UX/UI designers, showcasing the capabilities of AI-assisted design. | "Rapidly create on-trend designs with our AI-assisted UX/UI design services." | Design-focused, visual |
|  |  | Behance | Attracts potential clients, such as product managers, by showcasing AI-generated design projects on a popular platform for creative professionals. |  | Creative, visual |
| 9 | AI-driven email marketing personalization | Email Marketing Conference Sponsorships | Connects with marketing professionals interested in email marketing by sponsoring conferences and events in the industry. | "Supercharge your email campaigns with AI-driven personalization." | Networking, industry-focused |
|  |  | LinkedIn Ads | Targets marketing managers on a professional platform, showcasing the benefits of AI-driven email marketing personalization. |  | Targeted, B2B-focused |
| 10 |  |  |  |  |  |
